name: portfolium
description: Personal Portfolio Website with Project Tracker & Blog

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Root installation complete. Run npm run setup to install all dependencies.'
scripts.setup: echo 'Installing client dependencies...' && cd client && npm install && echo 'Installing server dependencies...' && cd ../server && npm install && echo 'Setup complete!'
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning node_modules...' && rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm install && npm run setup
